'''''Crack in the Code!''''' is the first installment of the ''[[Minecraft: Stonesword Saga]]'' series, authored by [[Nick Eliopulos]]. The book continues the story from where the ''[[Minecraft: Woodsword Chronicles]]'' series left off.

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|Based on the most popular video game of all time, this all-new chapter book series takes a group of intrepid [[Minecraft]] players deeper into the game than ever before. Someone–or something–has turned the [[Evoker King]] to stone. And now a new player, [[Theo Grayson|Theo]], has joined the team on their quest to return their former enemy to normal. Theo’s has coding skills that could come in handy, but does he have what it takes to be part of the team, or will his meddling put a crack in the game code that none of them will survive? |author=Description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/667615/crack-in-the-code-minecraft-stonesword-saga-1-by-nick-eliopulos/9780593372982/|title=Crack in the Code! (Minecraft Stonesword Saga #1)|website=Penguin Random House}}</ref>}}
